articles.description: Five-time champion Tiger Woods records his worst round at the Masters, finishing 10 over par on day three at Augusta National to go 11 over.
articles.title: Masters 2024: Tiger Woods posts worst round in major at Augusta National in round three

articles.description: A 5-1 home win over Luton was the ideal fixture for Manchester City, nestled between two Champions League ties with Real Madrid.
articles.title: Perfect day for Guardiola as Man City take top spot

articles.description: Real Madrid warm up for a pivotal week with a hard-fought win over Mallorca in La Liga thanks to Aurelien Tchouameni's long-range goal.
articles.title: Tchouameni strike gives Real Madrid scrappy win

articles.description: Manchester United twice come from behind to deny Bournemouth victory but their winless Premier League run extends to four games.
articles.title: Fernandes double earns Man Utd point at Bournemouth

articles.description: Emma Raducanu withstands a late surge from France's Diane Parry to secure Great Britain's place in the Billie Jean King Cup Finals.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup qualifying: Emma Raducanu and Katie Boulter earn GB win over France

articles.description: Casper Ruud will face Stefanos Tsitsipas in the final of Monte Carlo Masters after a 6-5 1-6 6-4 win against Novak Djokovic.
articles.title: Monte Carlo Masters: Casper Ruud beats Novak Djokovic to set up Stefanos Tsitsipas final

articles.description: England's discipline is "not good enough" despite scoring eight tries to overpower Scotland 46-0 in the women's Six Nations, says Brian Moore.
articles.title: Unbeaten England's discipline 'not good enough'

articles.description: Joao Felix scores a superb overhead kick as a much-changed Barcelona side battle to victory over relegation-threatened Cadiz in La Liga.
articles.title: Joao Felix scores overhead kick as Barca beat Cadiz

articles.description: Ireland score five tries to secure a dominant bonus-point 36-5 win over Wales and clinch their first victory of the 2024 Women's Six Nations.
articles.title: Ireland dominate Wales for first Six Nations win

articles.description: Harlequins beat Bordeaux-Begles in a thrilling match to reach the semi-finals of the Champions Cup for the first time.
articles.title: Harlequins stun Bordeaux to make semi-finals
